body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play a Sphinx of Lost Truths, both with and without paying the kicker. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The comes-into-play effect should be "draw three cards, then discard three cards" if the kicker is not paid, and "draw three cards" if it is. Instead it's the other way around (though the descriptions match the way it ought to be). What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.34, MacOS 10.8
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Sphinx of Lost Truths makes you discard if you didn't pay the kicker, not if you did

comments.body: ...Wait, I phrased that backward in the title. It makes you discard if you *paid* the kicker, and not if you *didn't*.
